subject: Attention;very urgent Beneficiary.
body:
From United Nations Social Welfare Organization,


Attention;very urgent Beneficiary.

I am Mrs.Yamini Aiyar the financial officer of United Nations Social
Welfare  Organization in association with International Monetary
Funds.

This message is to announce to you that you have been promoted, You
Have Won  ($42,5Millions) from the Scottish Global Award Medallion
Promotion.

Your names and your details were selected from Stock Exchange database
and was submitted to the International Bureau Exchange Desk ballot
system, drawn from Organizations. This is as a result of you been a
shares beneficiary in the stock market. In addition to that, your name
is on the international stock exchange list stating that you are a
share.

Congratulations: This message is to notify you that you have Won
($42,5Millions) USAD from United Nations Social Welfare Organization.
The World Global Aid have noticed that people are dying of hunger,
child abuse, Human Trafficking natural disasters and criminal
activities have gone very high in the society these days. The
international monetary funds IMF have placed easy funds to people all
over the world to have good life, maintain good living for family and
for educating students.

You are receiving the message as the winner your $42,5Millions has
been endorsed and You are therefore been approved to make urgent claim
of your FUND. This Award is a great opportunity for you and your
family, this award will settle you financial needs.

Secondly,the only money you pay is the sum of $160 required to obtain
your funds Clearance Certificate from the origin of the funds to avoid
any harassment from the Airport authority and you are also expecting
to be announce as winner of the said amount as soon as your fund is
delivered to your doorstep with 100 % guarantee from United Nations.

So you are urgent advised to get back to me with your home address and
also the payment today for immediate effect of your delivery. Note
that the $160 is the only fee and final payment you have my assurance.
However, according to our agreement with the originated all our
communications should be on email for record purpose so follow my
instruction accordingly, even if you donâ€™t have the $160 try to borrow
it and send it immediately,

Please I will advice you to urgent make the payment to enable the
origin secure the required clearance certificate. Note that it will
take only 48 hrs to deliver your Bank Cheque Draft in receipt of the
$160 payment. Be advised to buy $160 i TUNE CARD or SEPHORA CARD OR
STEAM GIFT CAED scratch back of the card and attached the picture to
us for the payment so that you can receive your $42,5Millions,

Please provide the information below to COMPLETE YOUR TRANSFER REGISTRATION:

1.  Full Name:
2.  Address:
3.  Occupation:
4.  Age:
5.  Sex:
6.  Nationality:
7.  State:
8.  Country Of Residence:
9.  city.....
10. Phone Number:
11.Your bank details....

Kindly fill in your correct information. Please note that changes to
transaction details will not be possible after authorization.

Yours Faithfully,

Mrs.Yamini Aiyar,
President and Chief Executive of the Centre for Policy Research,

subject: Re: Attention;very urgent Beneficiary.
body:
Hello Aiyar,

Wow, this is such exciting news! I can't believe I've been selected for such an honor. It's truly a surprise as I don't remember participating in any lottery or contest. Could you please tell me more about how my name was chosen? 

Also, could you explain a bit more about the Scottish Global Award Medallion Promotion? What is it exactly and what does it entail?

I'm also curious about the United Nations Social Welfare and the work they do. How are they involved in this award?

You mentioned something about a payment for fund clearance. Could you clarify what that means? And why is it necessary to buy a TUNE CARD or SEPHORA CARD OR STEAM GIFT CAED?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
James
